description: President Obama followed up on Tuesday’s announcement to withdraw all troops from Afghanistan by 2016, telling West Point graduates that “empowering partners” is a large part of their mission.
title: Obama Discusses Efforts in Afghanistan
title_page: Obama Discusses Efforts in Afghanistan - Video - NYTimes.com
text: President Obama followed up on Tuesday’s announcement to withdraw all troops from Afghanistan by 2016, telling West Point graduates that “empowering partners” is a large part of their mission.
